name: Lovely Delivery
description:
A Game By :

GraineMojo - Dev/GD/SD/Graph (4Hours)
Yullen - GD/Graph/MentalHealthSupport (4 Hours)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow Cylie in their adventure and deliver babies !

Use the Spacebar to jump and fly accross the city.

A simple and cute game made in three~ich hours for the TriJam 132, theme : Package Delivered.
